name: message-dev1
doc: A message was posted. There are several types of messages depending on where they are posted. https://api.slack.com/events/message

fields.name: type
fields.doc: The specific name of the event

fields.name: user
fields.doc: The ID of the user that sent the message (eg U061F7AUR).

fields.name: channel
fields.doc: ID of the channel where the message was sent (eg C0LAN2Q65).

fields.name: edited
fields.doc: Indicates that the message has been edited, if not null.

type.name: edited
type.doc: Information about how a message was edited.

fields.name: user
fields.doc: The ID of the user that edited the message.

fields.name: ts
fields.doc: The timestamp of when the message was edited.

fields.name: hidden
fields.doc: Whether the message is considered hidden, or not.
